text: unakee onkhon se onsoo jaaree the (ilzaam kee) sabeel to sirph unheen logon par hai jinhonne baavajood maaladaar hone ke tumase (jihaad mein) na jaane kee ijaazat chaahee aur unake peechhe rah jaane vaale (auraton, bachchon) ke saath rahana pasand aaya aur khuda ne unake dilon par (goya) mohar kar dee hai to ye log kuchh nahin jaanate
